__e: See, I love Mia and want her to be happy.
What happened before, with Mia and everyone... ..do you think about that a lot?
That boy is just here so you can get Mia back and have your shitty kid.
Mia, you are the only person that can help me right now.
If you need me to, I can work on Mia, because you know he'll do whatever she says.
So, Mia... you had no reservations about going to a guy's room alone?
This is the first sign we've had in six months Mia is even alive.
So, why do you think this Mia is calling you in the middle of the night?
Because he thinks Mia's just there to talk.
Anyway, Mia's not here, so you should just crash in her room, okay?
Mia, I don't know you but I think I want to spend the rest of my life trying to.
So it's okay that my daughter is gay, but not Mia?
Yeah, but I didn't kill her.
But right now Mia's gone,and she's in here running her mouth about how ugly everything is.
I mean, for god's sake, Mia was like a mother to you.
- My point, Miss Mia, is that there are 825,000 men walking around out there for you to choose from.
It's clear as day that Mia's the most important thing in your world.
Whatever is inside Mia is the cause of all this.
